..: iNSTALL/REGiSTER NOTES :..

Add the following line to your hosts file.
(located in Windows\System32\drivers\etc)

127.0.0.1 secure.tune-up.com


WHAT file? the hosts file? which file is it? there is no file named host otherwise I don't no whicht file you mean sry

Your host file is located in C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc

Edit the host file and add this line:

127.0.0.1   secure.tune-up.com
Hello S4A. Thank you for this. Can  ask: Why is this necessary? What does the hostfile trick do? Isn't it enough to just enter a valid 2011 serial number during the installation?
